hero.title: Sunshine-AIO
hero.subtitle: All-in-One Solution for Configuring Your Gaming Streaming Environment. One-Click Installation for Sunshine and All Required Components.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Sunshine-AIO?
whyChoose.subtitle: Get Everything You Need to Configure Your Gaming Streaming in One Installation.

allInOne.title: All-in-One Solution
allInOne.description: Install All Required Components with a Single Click. No Manual Configuration Required.

quickSetup.title: Fast Setup
quickSetup.description: Be Up and Running in Minutes, Not Hours, Thanks to Our Automated Installation.

preConfigured.title: Pre-Configured
preConfigured.description: Everything is Pre-Configured for Optimal Performance from the Moment of Installation.

sunshine.name: Sunshine-AIO
sunshine.description: All-in-One Solution for Configuring Your Gaming Streaming Environment. Compatible with Windows 10 and Windows 11 Only. Recommended for Most Users!

moonlight.name: Moonlight
moonlight.description: Free, Open-Source Client for Streaming Games from Your PC. Compatible with Windows, MacOS, Linux, Steam Link Devices, Raspberry Pi 4, Chromebook Laptops, Tablets, Android, iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Apple TV, Single-Board Computers, Xbox One, Xbox Series S|X, PlayStation Vita with Homebrew, Nintendo Switch with Homebrew, Wii U with Homebrew, and LG webOS TVs.

sunshine_base.name: Sunshine
sunshine_base.description: Self-Hosted Game Streaming Host for Moonlight.

virtual_display.name: Virtual Display Driver
virtual_display.description: Create Virtual Displays for Remote Gaming.

playnite.name: Playnite
playnite.description: Game Library Manager with Support for Multiple Platforms.

playnite_watcher.name: Playnite Watcher
playnite_watcher.description: Automatically Updates the Sunshine Game List Based on Your Playnite Library.

download.title: Install Sunshine-AIO
download.description: Launch a Terminal (Not CMD) or PowerShell Directly from Your Computer and Run This Command to Install Sunshine-AIO:
download.note: Note: A 'Sunshine-AIO' Folder Will Be Created on Your Desktop Containing the Necessary Tools for Program Functionality.

install.title: Start the Installation
install.description: When the Application Starts, Type '1' and Press Enter to Begin the Complete Installation Process. This Will Install and Configure All Required Components Automatically for Your Gaming Streaming Configuration.

complete.title: Installation Complete!
complete.description: After Following These Steps, Sunshine-AIO Will Be Fully Installed and Configured on Your System. You Can Now Start Streaming Your Games with Moonlight!

overview.title: Project Overview
overview.description: Sunshine-AIO is an All-in-One Solution for Configuring Your Gaming Streaming Environment. It Simplifies the Installation and Configuration Process of Multiple Tools Required for Game Streaming, Making it Accessible to Everyone.

collaboration.title: Created in Collaboration
collaboration.description: This Website Was Created in Collaboration Between:
